Overview
RTC_Timer_RTC001 App

Overview

The use cases of RTC001 App APIs are as below.

The user can enable/disable the RTC by calling RTC001_Enable() & RTC001_Disable() APIs. App allows the user to configure the current date and time through the UI provided or can be configured at runtime by using RTC001_Clock_SetTime() & RTC001_Clock_GetTime() APIs. Also App provides user to configure alarm through UI or at run time using API RTC001_ConfigAlarm()

The configurations done in hibernate mode include the enabling of alarm event, periodic second event, periodic minute event, periodic hour event, periodic month event and periodic year event.

App also provides UI to configure Interrupt handler for both alarm and RTC Periodic Timer interrupts.

The App provides option for the user to manage the trigger either using NVIC_SCU001 App or EXCP001 App. In the case of NVIC_SCU001 App the user has to define the timer and alarm handlers and configure the same in RTC001 App. While in the case of EXCP001 App, handling of NMI shall be enabled in EXCP001 app.

App Memory Requirements
App Configuration Code Size (Bytes) RAM Size (Bytes)
App default configuration 3300 20
